content: why loving well except for the obvious small hearts and the divine fluffiness it is a very fast knit which allows you to create quickly a big volume of hats for a charity for example great to use these pieces of scrap yarn too you will need 30-75 meters of super bulky yarn in total 1 main color and as many contrasting ones you like let your imagination free you can easily make 3-4 of them in an evening hope you enjoy the pattern
